title: Fix Cohen-Sutherland algorithm implementation for d3d9
Passing actual color in fill attribute
Simplify the cargo-c usage and generate the library as libpathfinder
Allow clip paths to nest in the canvas API.
Clip line segments before tiling them, and remove the cap on the number of iterations when tiling.
Initialize resized mask textures to rgba(0, 0, 0, 0), not rgba(0, 0, 0, 1).
Add 1px of texture border around non-repeating image patterns.
Allow radial gradients to be evaluated with any nonzero discriminant, not just ones with magnitude above `EPSILON`.
Make the fields of `TextMetrics` lazily calculated, and add an API that eliminates double layouts.
Cache images from frame to frame.
Document the remainder of the `pathfinder_renderer` API
Implement gradient wrap/spread modes in SVG.
Flesh out the `web_canvas` crate a bit more
Start a new `web_canvas` crate, for usage in the browser as a `<canvas>` replacement
Fix WebGL, and add a simple example of WebGL usage
Combine the Z-buffer and fill indirect draw params buffers to reduce the number of SSBO bindings.
Implement nested SVG clip paths in the D3D11 backend.
Fix Metal memory management and the `canvas_metal_minimal`, `canvas_nanovg`, and `macos_app` examples.
Turn off timer queries if the debug UI is off.
Expose OpenGL 4.x in the C bindings
`usvg` should never have nested `<svg>` nodes, so remove code that (doesn't) handle that case.
Add a rendering path for Direct3D 11-class hardware that uses compute shader for most stages.
Expose creating a resource loader from a path to C
Only use foreign-types on macOS in the C API
Add missing Metal shader to resources/MANIFEST
Implement BitAnd, BitOr, and Not for U32x2 in scalar version.
Don't restrict render command listeners to the static lifetime
Use SIMD a bit more in the new tiling code.
Replace the tiling algorithm with the one from "Random Access Vector Graphics".
Associate texture parameters in shaders with specific texture units, to work around a macOS Radeon driver bug.
Change how point_queue and active_edges are sorted for performance
Fix non-integer HiDPI support in demo
Switch to the embedded loader for the examples.
Only define `precision highp sampler2D` in OpenGL ES.
Add an example showing how to use the Pathfinder C API with GLFW
Update the resource manifest for recent changes
Provide a placeholder definition of `CAMetalLayer` in the C API.
Upgrade to the latest master surfman
Switch to using surfman in X11 mode.
Enable compute shader by default if the OpenGL version is high enough.
Clear the canvas to the background color if no drawing command did so.
Add OpenGL 4.3 support to the GL backend, enabling compute shader on non-Metal platforms
Use all four channels in the mask texture.
Reduce the size of buffers for performance
Reduce timing jitter in the Metal backend
Generalize the buffer allocator to support multiple size classes, and use it for tile compositing too
Add arm64 CI and fix build errors

Use instant crate to build for wasm32 target

use a binary search for pathfinder_renderer::SortedVector
